Constructors summary

Disk()

Initializes a new instance of the Disk class.
Disk(String, CreationData, String, String, String, IDictionary<String, String>, Nullable<StorageAccountTypes>, Nullable<DateTime>, Nullable<OperatingSystemTypes>, Nullable<Int32>, EncryptionSettings, String, String)
Disk(String, CreationData, String, String, String, IDictionary(Of String, String), Nullable(Of StorageAccountTypes), Nullable(Of DateTime), Nullable(Of OperatingSystemTypes), Nullable(Of Int32), EncryptionSettings, String, String)

Initializes a new instance of the Disk class.

Properties summary

AccountType
AccountType

Gets or sets the storage account type of the disk. Possible values include: 'Standard_LRS', 'Premium_LRS'
CreationData
CreationData

Gets or sets disk source information. CreationData information cannot be changed after the disk has been created.
DiskSizeGB
DiskSizeGB

Gets or sets if creationData.createOption is Empty, this field is mandatory and it indicates the size of the VHD to create. If this field is present for updates or creation with other options, it indicates a resize. Resizes are only allowed if the disk is not attached to a running VM, and can only increase the disk's size.
EncryptionSettings
EncryptionSettings

Gets or sets encryption settings for disk or snapshot
OsType
OsType

Gets or sets the Operating System type. Possible values include: 'Windows', 'Linux'
OwnerId
OwnerId

Gets a relative URI containing the VM id that has the disk attached.
ProvisioningState
ProvisioningState

Gets the disk provisioning state.
TimeCreated
TimeCreated

Gets the time when the disk was created.

    • creationData
      CreationData
      CreationData

      Disk source information. CreationData information cannot be changed after the disk has been created.

      String

      String

      Nullable<StorageAccountTypes>
      Nullable(Of StorageAccountTypes)

      the storage account type of the disk. Possible values include: 'Standard_LRS', 'Premium_LRS'

    • timeCreated
      Nullable<DateTime>
      Nullable(Of DateTime)

      The time when the disk was created.

    • osType
      Nullable<OperatingSystemTypes>
      Nullable(Of OperatingSystemTypes)

      The Operating System type. Possible values include: 'Windows', 'Linux'

    • diskSizeGB
      Nullable<Int32>
      Nullable(Of Int32)

      If creationData.createOption is Empty, this field is mandatory and it indicates the size of the VHD to create. If this field is present for updates or creation with other options, it indicates a resize. Resizes are only allowed if the disk is not attached to a running VM, and can only increase the disk's size.

    • encryptionSettings

      EncryptionSettings

      Encryption settings for disk or snapshot

      String

      A relative URI containing the VM id that has the disk attached.

      String
      String

      The disk provisioning state.
